snippet: In the Democratic primary, the support for candidates backed by Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez has not completely wavered in the wake of Mr. Lopez’s sexual harassment scandal.
abstract: Support for candidates backed by scandal-plagued Assemblyman Vito J Lopez has not completely wavered in the latest Brooklyn Democratic primary; Lincoln Restler, who used his position in the Brooklyn Democratic Party to denounce Lopez for what he called patronage and corruption, trails Chris Olechowski, Lopez's preferred candidate, in the vote for the post of district leader.
lead_paragraph: In the Democratic primary, the support for candidates backed by Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez has not completely wavered in the wake of Mr. Lopez’s sexual harassment scandal.

headline.seo: In Race to Succeed Lopez, Show of Strength for Brooklyn Democratic Machine
headline.main: Show of Strength for Brooklyn Democratic Machine
headline.print_headline: Show of Strength for Brooklyn Democratic Machine
